rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently obtained a map to a great treasure.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently obtained a map to an old and forgotten civilization.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) house was recently burned down by a mysterious fire.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) house was recently destroyed by a mysterious earthquake.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) house was recently destroyed by a mysterious tornado.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is looking for $(identity.pronouns.possessive) lost $(relation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is looking for $(identity.pronouns.possessive) lost $(item).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help finding a $(item).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help stealing a $(item) from a nearby house.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help stealing a $(item) from a nearby commerce.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help stealing a $(item) from a nearby castle.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks revenge for the death of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) $(relation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help fighting a rebellious organization who wants to take control of the governement.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help fighting a rebellious organization who wants to take control of the clergy.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is part of a secret rebellious organization who wants to take control of the government.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is part of a secret rebellious organization who wants to take control of the clergy.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a $(item) to $(identity.pronouns.possessive) $(relation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a $(item) to the local $(organisation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with a nearby cavern with amazing waterfalls.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with a nearby cliff with an eerily beautiful view.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with a nearby grove with extraordinary flowers.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with a nearby valley with luxurious vegetation.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with a nearby tavern with absolutely incredible ale.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is spying on the players on behalf of an organization of $(bias).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is spying the players on behalf of the local $(organisation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help gathering information on an organization of $(bias).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help gathering information on the local $(organisation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a duel to the death on the morrow but $(identity.pronouns.singular) is afraid to lose it.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) challenges a PC to a duel to the death.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being blackmailed into challenging a PC to a duel to the death.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently come into possession of a powerful magical $(item), and nobody knows how.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently woken up with a magical rune on $(identity.pronouns.possessive) $(bodypart).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being haunted by a ghost.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being haunted by the ghost of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) dead $(relation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) was tricked into wearing a cursed $(item).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has discovered a secret passage under $(identity.pronouns.possessive) house leading to a mysterious cave.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has discovered a secret passage under $(identity.pronouns.possessive) house leading to a secret organisation.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has discovered a secret passage under $(identity.pronouns.possessive) house leading to an hidden temple.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been pressured by local drug dealers into selling drugs.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is part of a local drug dealing circle.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is the head of a local drug dealing circle.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is the head of an international drug dealing circle.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is organizing a $(contest). The prize will be a $(item).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help organizing a $(contest).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is possessed by an evil spirit who makes $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) do horrible things at night, without remembering them.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is possessed by an evil spirit during the day and can only control $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson)self at night.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is currently being chased by a band of bandits attempting to rob $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) and asks the PCs for protection.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is currently chasing a bandit and asks the PCs for help.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is currently being chased by law enforcement and asks the PCs for protection.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hired to steal items from the PCs.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hired to steal money from the PCs.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hired to assassinate the PCs.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is the host of a terrible and deadly sickness.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) blood is the cure to a terrible and deadly sickness.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) home has been infested by zombies.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help exorcising $(identity.pronouns.possessive) $(relation).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is in dire need of some $(monster) blood.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) house has been eaten by a purple worm. Further inspection of the tunnel reveals a complex cave system.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) house has been eaten by a purple worm. Further inspection of the tunnel reveals an ancient catacomb.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) wants the PCs to help $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) kill a $(monster).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) wants the PCs to help $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) capture a $(monster).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has learned of the existence of a shrine to $(deity).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has angered $(deity) and needs help avoiding the consequences.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a fountain of wild magic and cannot control it.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) gives the PCs a magical $(item). Turns out $(identity.pronouns.singular) had stolen it from a wizard who is hellbent on recovering it.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is secretly a vampire.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) carries around a large $(color) egg of unknown origin.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is looking for $(identity.pronouns.possessive) lost $(relation), who never actually existed.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently obtained a fake map to a great treasure.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks revenge for the death of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) $(relation), who never actually existed.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a tamed $(creature) to a local wizard.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a tamed $(creature) to a local zoo.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a tamed $(creature) to a local circus.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs the party to deliver a tamed $(creature) to a local museum.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed day and night by a $(personality.asString) speaking crow.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed day and night by a $(personality.asString) speaking mouse.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed day and night by a $(personality.asString) speaking snake.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed day and night by a $(personality.asString) speaking cat.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed day and night by an animated $(furniture).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been cursed into speaking only gibberish.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is willingly wearing a cursed $(item).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hexed into constantly hallucinating.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hexed and is now constantly hungry.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hexed into becoming minuscule.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been hexed into becoming gigantic.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being constantly pranked by a leprechaun.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being constantly psychologically tortured by a crazed leprechaun.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help sabotaging a $(contest).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a were$(werebeast).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a were$(werebeast) and tries to convince the PCs to let $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) change them as well.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a were$(werebeast) and wants to get rid of it.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a were$(werebeast) and is looking for acceptance within society.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) approaches the PC by falling from the sky. $(identity.pronouns.singular) has 50% chance of surviving the landing.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is currently chasing a band of bandits and asks the PCs for help.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is currently being chased by a band of bandits $(identity.prnouns.thirdPerson) just stole from and asks the PCs for protection.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a doppleganger.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is actually a doppleganger who killed $(identity.name.asString) and is living $(identity.pronouns.possessive) life.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a doppleganger posing as one of the PCs.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) lives with an incubus.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) lives with a succubus.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) lives with an incubus. They are trying to fit in with society.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) lives with a succubus. They are trying to fit in with society.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is raising an Otyugh in the town's sewer system. It's always hungry.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) home has been infested by zombies. Upon further inquiry, the zombies are asking for help.
All of $(identity.pronouns.possessive) furniture has suddenly become animated.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) home has been infested by zombies. Upon further inquiry, the zombies are asking for brains.
$(identity.pronouns.possessive) home has been infested by zombies. Upon further inquiry, the zombies used to live there, and are claiming the house as belonging to them.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a serial killer at night.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a cannibal.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a cannibal, and $(identity.pronouns.singular) wants to convert the PCs to $(identity.pronouns.possessive) ways.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a secret vigilante.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a secret vigilante, and considers the PCs a threat to society.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is addicted to $(creature) blood.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) wants the PCs to help $(identity.pronouns.possessive) tame a $(creature).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being stalked by a gibbering mouth at night
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is actually an Oni posing as a $(description.race).
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has fallen in love with a dryad from a local forest.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has fallen in love with a mermaid from the nearest water source.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has fallen in love with a fairy from the nearby woods.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessively in love with a dryad. $(identity.pronouns.singular) keeps her locked up in $(identity.pronouns.possessive) basement.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessively in love with a mermaid. $(identity.pronouns.singular) keeps her locked up in $(identity.pronouns.possessive) basement.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessively in love with a fairy. $(identity.pronouns.singular) keeps her locked up in $(identity.pronouns.possessive) basement.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has been enslaved by a demon.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being controlled by an illithid.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is being harassed about a threat of impending doom by a pseudodragon.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is slowly becoming a plant.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is followed by multiple animals at all time.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is openly a vampire.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) talks very fast and incomprehensibly to the NPCs before turning to stone.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) talks very fast and incomprehensibly to the NPCs before turning to dust.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is actually a $(color) dragon.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has recently come into possession of an unreasonable amount of fish, and it's not clear why.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) gives the PCs a magical $(item). Turns out $(identity.prnouns.thirdPerson) had stolen it from an imp who is hellbent on recovering it.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) $#pluralize(identity.pronouns,'is','are')# a time traveller from a distant past.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a time traveller from a distant past. $(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with finding her descendants.

$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a time traveller from a distant past. $(identity.pronouns.singular) is obsessed with finding the treasure $(identity.prnouns.thirdPerson) buried thousands of years ago.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a time traveller from a distant future. $(identity.pronouns.singular) needs help sleeping for a few thousand years.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is a time traveller from a distant future. $(identity.pronouns.singular) is trying to alter the course of history.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is possessed by an evil spirit. They argue constantly.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has started using snakes as currency, and it's starting to catch on.
